feed.title: Google Cloud: Database Center
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Database Center

entry.content: You can create alerting policies for new database resources and signals, using filters to restrict the monitored metric data. This feature lets you get detailed insights into the health of your database fleet and troubleshoot issues. You can filter data based on metric labels, such as signal type, or by resource labels, such as the resource's location or name. For more information, see Metrics and alerting policy filters.
entry.summary: Create alerting policies for new database resources and signals with filters to restrict monitored metric data, gaining detailed insights into your database fleet's health and troubleshooting issues by filtering data based on metric or resource labels.
entry.title: Feature: Database Alerting Policies

entry.content:
The following performance recommendations and insights are available in Database Center:

  • Replication lag for Bigtable.
  • Outdated client for Bigtable.
  • Connections burdening disk for Cloud SQL for SQL Server.
  • Location org policy not satisfied for Spanner.

For more information, see Supported health issues.
entry.summary: Database Center now provides performance insights for Bigtable replication lag and outdated clients, as well as Cloud SQL for SQL Server connection issues and Spanner location policy violations.
entry.title: Feature: Database performance insights now available in Database Center

entry.content: Database Center offers monitoring support for databases running on Google Compute Engine virtual machines. This feature is in Preview. To request access to this feature, visit the access request page. For more information, see Monitor databases on Compute Engine virtual machines.
entry.summary: Monitoring for databases on Compute Engine virtual machines is now available in preview.
entry.title: Feature: New Monitoring Support for GCE Databases

entry.content: Database Center supports the analyze system performance feature in the High Resource Utilization recommendation for AlloyDB for PostgreSQL. For more information, see Performance insights and recommendations.
entry.summary: Analyze system performance for AlloyDB now available.
entry.title: Feature: New Feature: AlloyDB Performance Analysis

entry.content: You can monitor the number of new Google Cloud database resources that were added to your fleet over the past 1, 7, or 30 days. For more information, see View recently added database resources.
entry.summary: Monitor new database resources added to your fleet over the past 1, 7, or 30 days.
entry.title: Changed: Monitoring new database resources

entry.content: You can enable Gemini chat at the folder level to help you learn about Google Cloud database products. To learn how to enable Gemini chat at the folder level, see Before you begin using Gemini chat.
entry.summary: Gemini chat is now available at the folder level.
entry.title: Changed: Gemini Chat Available at Folder Level
